title: Ookami Buka-kun to Hitsuji Joushi-san
original_name: オオカミ部下くんとヒツジ上司さん
sinopse:
Wolf-man Oogami is a salaryman at a mattress and bedding company whose coworkers are all sheep. Normally, this lone wolf keeps to himself, but his job in this new department is both a blessing and a curse. Oogami has a crush on an adorable sheep-lady supervisor and it appears to be more than just a case of mere puppy-love...

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
